cgcloud__CP_Search_Strategy_Step__c.name: cgcloud__CP_Search_Strategy_Step__c
cgcloud__CP_Search_Strategy_Step__c.description: This object stores the details of the relationship between search strategy and key type, which is used to search for complex pricing strategy steps.

cgcloud__Account_Hierarchy_Search__c.description: Specifies if and how the customer hierarchy is to be considered for condition finding.

cgcloud__Consider_Account_Hierarchy__c.description: Specifies if condition will be searched only in the trade org hierarchy of the orderer.

cgcloud__Consider_Account__c.description: Specifies if business partner will be used as key for condition finding.

cgcloud__Consider_Product_Hierarchy__c.description: Specifies if condition will be searched only in the product hierarchy.

cgcloud__Constraint_User_Exit_Id__c.description: Unique identifier for a user exit that represents a constraint for the search strategy step in question: Step will be skipped if user exit confirms the fulfilled constraint.

cgcloud__Customer_Role__c.description: Specifies the role of the customer that's relevant for condition finding.

cgcloud__Exclusive__c.description: Specifies whether condition search stops after having found a condition.

cgcloud__Key_Type_Description__c.description: Description of the reference Key Type.

cgcloud__Product_Hierarchy_Only__c.description: Specifies if condition will be searched only in the product hierarchy.

cgcloud__Product_Hierarchy_Search__c.description: Specifies if and how the product hierarchy is to be considered for condition finding.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the search strategy step record.

cgcloud__Sort__c.description: Position of the search strategy step in the search strategy.
